name: Wooden Mummy In Crazyland
description:
Description:
Transmit your infectious disease to unknowing residents of Crazy Town! The wooden mummy tries to instill fear but looks silly doing so. 

We printed out our UVs and built them into paper models to paint them. Later on we took pictures of the results and used it as textures for our game!

This short game was made during Global Game Jam 2018.
https://globalgamejam.org/2018/games/wooden-mummy-crazy-land

Creds:
Eshan Jayatilaka [3D Artists]
Aidan Wong [Programmer]
Sean-Li Murmann [Programmer]
Victor Low [Cardboard Magician]
Shawn Beck [SFX, VFX, UX]
Edison New [Design]
